title: Sweet shop ordered to pay 30K for failing to mention expiry date
author: Avitex
desc: Namakkal: The Namakkal district consumer disputes redressal commission (NCDRC) has ordered a sweet shop located on Sathy Road in Ganapathy, Coimbatore, to pay a compensation of 30,000 for failing to provide a receipt with the customer's name and for not mentioning the expiry date of the product.

title: TV company wins case against man alleging false 100% cashback offer
author: Avitex
desc: Dehradun: The state consumer commission ruled in favour of television manufacturing company LG on Wednesday in a case where it was accused of breaching an advertised offer. The complainant, a Roorkee resident, claimed that a newspaper ad by the company promised a complimentary Bluetooth speaker, an Airtel digital set-top box, and up to 100% cashback with the purchase of a television, but the items were not provided to him.

title: Rail passenger gets Rs 25,000 in damages for waterless toilet
author: Avitex
desc: VISAKHAPATNAM: District consumer commission has directed South Central Railway (SCR) to pay 25,000 on the account of physical and mental agony to a passenger and his family who complained to have suffered due to unavailability of water and lack of air conditioning in the toilets.

title: Why Court ordered Xiaomi to pay Rs 33,500 compensation to a customer
author: Avitex
desc: The District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission in Mumbai has ordered Xiaomi to pay Rs 33,500 in compensation to a customer for failing to properly repair a smartphone.

title: Bengaluru man sues matrimony firm for failing to find match for son, gets Rs 60k relief
author: Avitex
desc: BENGALURU: A Koramangala-based matrimonial services provider, which had promised to find a suitable match for a youth within 45 days but failed to propose even a single potential bride.

title: Railways told to pay 25k to passenger over toilet, AC issues
author: Avitex
desc: Visakhapatnam: District consumer commission has directed South Central Railway (SCR) to pay 25,000 on account of physical and mental agony to a passenger and his family.

title: Pay biker compensation for stolen vehicle: Forum
author: Avitex
desc: Hyderabad: The Rangareddy District Consumer Forum has directed HMDA and contractor managing paid parking to jointly compensate a biker.

title: Negligence of railway…’: Why Indian Railways has been asked to pay Rs 4.7 lakh to a passenger for bag theft
author: Avitex
desc: The National Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission (NCDRC) has ordered Indian Railways to compensate a passenger whose belongings were stolen.

title: Amazon fined Rs 18,000 for not refunding Rs 40,000 to woman whose phone was 'hacked'
author: Avitex
desc: A consumer court ruled in favour of a Chandigarh resident who faced financial losses due to fraudulent transactions on Amazon website.
